In this paper, sentence syntactic analysis of utterances, sentence alignment, using generative word alignment learning method, the word alignment process as the process of translating from the target language sentence to the source language sentence, for the given source language sentence and the target language sentence between the translation probability through the word alignment probability calculation, through the probability value of acquiring the utterance, the target utterance with the highest degree of semantic similarity, and the realization of bilingual translation.

title: System and method for measuring pressure inside pipelines or pressure vessels
abstract: A system and method for measuring pressure inside a pipeline or pressure vessel is disclosed. The system includes one or more units locatable around an external surface of the pipeline or vessel, each unit containing: a light source for generating a light beam a single fiber Mach Zehnder interferometer (SF-MZI) sensor bendable against an outer surface of the pipeline or vessel, for receiving the light beam a light receiver for receiving the light bean from an output of the SF-MZI sensor, said light receiver including an optical spectral analyzer and a local processor for signal conversion a data acquisition system associated with each of the one or more units to provide power to the elements of the unit and a central processor in communication with each of the local processors of each of the units, said central processor containing stored strain data, and the stored bend induced birefringence data.

title: Intelligent evaluation system for students' level in advanced algebra teaching
abstract: The invention relates to an intelligent evaluation system for students' level in advanced algebra teaching, which comprises a database construction module, a test question evaluation module and an intelligent terminal module the database construction module is used for screening advanced algebra test questions to build a test database and storing evaluation indexes and historical evaluation data the test question evaluation module is used for detecting students' advanced algebra knowledge according to the test question database, generating mutual evaluation score data, and obtaining test question evaluation results according to evaluation indexes, historical evaluation data and mutual evaluation score data and the intelligent terminal module is used for obtaining the classroom evaluation result, and comprehensively evaluating according to the test question evaluation result and the classroom evaluation result to obtain the final student level evaluation result. The invention can objectively and intelligently evaluate the students' learning level of advanced algebra.

title: A SYSTEM FOR MONITORING DISEASE PROGRESSION IN LEUKEMIA BASED ON THE REGULATION OF HO-1 EXPRESSION
abstract: The present invention proposes a system for monitoring disease progression in leukemia based on the regulation of HO-1 expression, and at the core of which is a well-designed multimodal deep learning neural network. The system integrates genomic data, clinical data and HO-1 expression levels and effectively analyzes these complex medical data through a multi-head attention mechanism. This approach greatly improves the accuracy and personalization of leukemia treatment and monitoring and provides strong data support for clinical decision-making.

title: An intelligent recruitment method with integrated video interviews
abstract: The present invention relates to the field of digital information technology, particularly an intelligent recruitment method with integrated video interview including the following steps: initial screening of resumes, resumes that meet the requirements of the job are entered into the system to be invited to an interview video interview appointment, HR will communicate with the interviewer to record the interview time into the system, the system will remind the interviewer and the applicant before the video interview with a text message video interview, using WEB RTC real-time communication technology, integrated face recognition and emotion recognition algorithms to collect video interview process expression micro-emotions Intelligent analysis, comprehensive statistical analysis of the entire interview process, answering various questions when the emotional changes and changes in facial features, to comprehensively judge the authenticity of the current interviewer, answer questions, and personnel mentality assessment and evaluation, to provide decision-making support for the interview, and ultimately an integrated video interview of intelligent recruitment methods.

title: A MEDICAL VILLAGE ROBOT
abstract: The present invention discloses a medical ward robot, the technical solution of which comprises a robot main body, a movement device and a movement path. The movement path includes an annular path attached to the corridor walls, an extension path attached to the walls of the patient rooms and a soft element that allows the robot main body to turn or travel straight ahead. The annular path is designed as a closed circle. The soft element includes a switch housing, a switch seat and a switch motor. On the various switch surfaces of the switch seat there are arranged an entry control path that allows the robot main body on the annular path to enter the extension path, an exit control path that allows the robot main body on the extension path to enter the annular path and a straight path that allows the robot main body on the annular path to travel straight through the soft element. The switch motor can position the paths on the various switch surfaces accordingly at the connection points of the extension path and the closed path while the switch seat is being driven. This can prevent the visit robot from being blocked during its movement.

title: Fully homomorphic encryption and decryption apparatus and method for operating the same
abstract: A fully homomorphic encryption and decryption apparatus and method are provided, which provide efficient (in terms of computational speed and resource consumption) encryption and decryption operations in fully homomorphic encryption schemes. The apparatus comprises a control module configured to obtain a secret key (SK) in response to a configuration message and provide the SK to both encryption and decryption modules via an interconnect bus. The encryption module is configured to obtain a public key (PK), encrypt a plaintext into a ciphertext based on the PK and SK, divide the ciphertext into a set of ciphertext slices based on a PK length and an interconnect bus width, and concurrently provide the set of ciphertext slices together with the PK to the decryption module. The decryption module is configured to concatenate the set of ciphertext slices into the ciphertext and decrypt the ciphertext into the plaintext based on the PK and SK.

title: Method for large-scale engineering geological remote sensing interpretation based on frame-format digital imaging
abstract: The present invention discloses a method for large-scale engineering geological remote sensing interpretation based on frame-format digital imaging, comprising the following steps: Step 1, Data Collection and Preprocessing Step 2, Large-Scale Scene Block Processing Step 3, Image Feature Extraction Step 4, Classification, Recognition, and Interpretation Step 5, Topographic Analysis and Elevation Extraction Step6, Change Detection and Monitoring Step 7, Storage. In Step 1, large-scale digital images are firstly obtained using drone or satellite remote sensing technology the original images undergo preprocessing operations. In Step 2, the large-scale scene images are segmented into multiple blocks using image segmentation algorithms for subsequent processing and analysis. This invention, by segmenting the acquired large-scale digital images and processing the segmented scene images, not only reduces the difficulty of remote sensing interpretation but also enhances the precision of the subsequently obtained terrain information.

title: A method, system, and computer-readable storage media for detecting EGFR gene mutations
abstract: This invention discloses a method, system, and computer-readable storage medium for detecting EGFR gene mutations. The method involves receiving chest CT images, extracting feature variables of multiple target radiomic features from these images. Each target radiomic feature exhibits no significant difference between chest plain CT and enhanced CT at the first significance level but demonstrates significant differences between EGFR mutation-positive and EGFR mutation-negative at the second significance level. By utilizing a regression model and these feature variables, scoring values corresponding to the chest CT images under processing are obtained. Based on these scoring values, the detection result of EGFR gene mutations in lung cancer patients corresponding to the chest CT images under processing is determined. These results reflect the probability of EGFR gene mutations. This method can detect EGFR gene mutations based on chest plain CT or enhanced CT images and has a broad scope of clinical applications.

title: System and method for detecting cybersecurity risks in managed artificial intelligence models
abstract: A system and method for detecting a combined cybersecurity risk for an artificial intelligence (AI) model is presented. The method includes: inspecting a computing environment for an AI model deployed therein generating a representation of the AI model in a security database, the security database including a representation of the computing environment detecting a first cybersecurity risk respective of the AI model inspecting the computing environment for a cybersecurity object determining that the AI model is exposed to a toxic combination cybersecurity risk based on the detected first cybersecurity risk and the cybersecurity object and initiating a mitigation action based on the toxic combination cybersecurity risk.

title: Liquid cooling while preventing electronic damage
abstract: A perfluoro compound includes perfluorobutyl ethylene (PFBE) and a fluoroalkane. The perfluoro compound has an azeotropic point between 40 degrees Celsius and 60 degrees Celsius, inclusive.

title: Messaging campaign drift detection
abstract: The invention provides a system and method for detecting message drift within registered message campaigns to ensure compliance with predefined use case parameters. Utilizing a messaging compliance registry (MCR), the system downloads campaign data and employs control vectors derived from sample texts, representing intended communications within specific use cases. These vectors enable real-time comparison of incoming messages against expected messaging, employing methods such as cosine similarity measures and various vectorization models. If an incoming message's vector significantly deviates from the established threshold, indicating message drift, the system can delay, quarantine, or tag the message, while notifying the MCR. The process ensures that messages adhere to their registered campaign's guidelines, enhancing regulatory compliance and content integrity across messaging platforms.

title: Frequency standard immune to laser wavelength variation and aging
abstract: Embodiments herein describe peak detection techniques for selecting an absorption line to lock a spectroscopy laser in a frequency reference (e.g., an atomic clock). In one embodiment, an atomic reference is used which has many absorption lines within a relatively small frequency range (e.g., within a gain profile of the spectroscopy laser). The peak detection techniques can evaluate which of these lines a laser can be locked to. For example, the peak detection algorithm can define a preferred absorption line. But if for some reason the spectroscopy laser cannot be locked to the preferred absorption line, the peak detection technique has at least one backup absorption line. By having a set of candidate absorption lines, the peak detection algorithm can identify a suitable absorption line for lasers with different gain regions, or as gain regions change.

title: Performant proximity matching between sets of unstructured records
abstract: Provided is a process, including obtaining, with a computer system, a first set of vectors in an embedding space and a second set of vectors in the embedding space determining, with the computer system, which pair of vectors in the first and second sets are closest to one another in the embedding space, the pair having one vector from each set and storing, with the computer system, in memory, the pair of vectors in the first and second sets that are determined to be closest to one another.

title: Detecting and analyzing phishing attacks through artificial intelligence
abstract: Detection of phishing messages in network communications is performed by receiving a transmitted message and detecting characteristics of the message. A determination is made if the message matches a pattern of a phishing message in a database, and classifies the message as a phishing or spam message accordingly. If the message does not match a known phishing message pattern, the message is checked for common signs of phishing or spam by determining the severity of a threat embodied by the message, and the message is categorized as having phishing characteristics and according to the severity of threat. In response the user responses to determinations of threats, criteria for detection of phishing characteristics is adjusted, thereby automatically revising criteria for future decisions as to whether the message represents suspected phishing.

title: Smart terminal based on big data and artificial intelligence gateway
abstract: The present invention discloses a smart terminal based on big data and artificial intelligence gateway, comprising a shell. Inside the shell, a control center is fixedly connected. On the right side of the shell, a display screen is fixedly connected, which is appropriately linked with the control center. A speaker is also fixedly connected on the right side of the shell, located below the display screen and appropriately connected to the control center. On the left side of the control center, there are multiple slots, including an active slot located below these slots. A stable slot is positioned behind the active slot and matches it correspondingly. The present invention effectively provides protection for the slots and the control center while allowing for simple adjustments between the shell and the arc-shaped rods based on actual working conditions. The overall operation is straightforward and highly practical.
